item.title: 第一次作业提交
item.description: 查询词条 作业1：在浏览器中输入［http://en.wikipedia.org/］进入维基百科；Search以下关键词，并将每个词条的解释（通常是第一段的第一句） Computer：A computer is a device that can be instructed to carry out an arbitrary set of arithmetic or logical operations automatically. Computer science：Computer science is the study of the theory, experimentation, and engineering that form the basis for the design and use of computers. Software：Computer software, or simply software, is a part of a computer system that consists of data or computer instructions, in contrast to the physical hardware from which the system is built.
